name: ParaLands
description:
A tough puzzle game where you have to travel between parallell worlds in order to progress.

This game was originally made and released in 2016 (man, time sure does fly), but now that I have an itch.io page, I figured I might just as well release it here, too.

Maybe one day, if I find the time to do it, I will turn this into a fully-fledged game. For now, please enjoy this little PuzzleScript version :)
